short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays bookmarks in the new tab page using a dark theme

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just a small extensions I've created for my own personal use. It might be useful to other developers out there so feel free to download it and use it at your own disposal. Please feel free to leave a review and propose any additional features you'd like to see in this extension.
